channel.title: While mitb is away
channel.description:
the server is going to HELL. ***** is logging on admin accounts, banning people.
everyone is duping items... the server doesnt save characters and you dont need a password to log on...

item.title: While mitb is away
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“hat trix, post:10, topic:409940”]cant blame it on mopar. he probably figured his users would be mature enough to not fuck shit up[/quote]I very much doubt that, he probably just didn’t see this coming/didn’t think it would be possible for this to happen

To be honest, we’re getting a rollback either way, so it’s not that important now. Just sit tight.

Read full topic

item.title: While mitb is away
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:7, topic:409940”]Enough guys, if Niall has done something then moparisthebest will know. There isn’t much point causing trouble over it, just sit tight and wait.

PS server has been slowly breaking for ages, nothing was done![/quote]True that, it has been slowly breaking! lol

Read full topic

item.title: While mitb is away
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:4, topic:409940”][quote author=Niall link=topic=511214.msg3709631#msg3709631 date=1313267744]

the server is going to HELL. nial_ is logging on admin accounts, banning people.

everyone is duping items… the server doesnt save characters and you dont need a password to log on…

fuck off with the false accusations already
[/quote]

your immature reactions are only going to raise eyebrows[/quote]

I’m sure it will raise eyebrows and I don’t really care since I trust the logs will be reviewed and that will prove my innocence

lets talk about being immature though, several people get banned before I even logged into the server, and when I found out the server was broken and didn’t require users to auth and everyone was reset on login I logged into a few other accounts and quit the game, come on the forums and people are blaming me for banning people? how about this, someone else logged into an admin account and unlike me didn’t announce that they weren’t an admin

also what does censoring my name achieve?

Read full topic

item.title: While mitb is away
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

fine, if you would like me to *****. i will sensor your name out of the topic. u know what u did was wrong in the first place. why WOULDNT we assume it was you if you were the one logging into admin accounts…?

Read full topic
